Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda puesto que se encuentra en mal estado y cuando llueve  el agua se filtra. Con el crédito comprará lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en: Nelson is 32 years old and lives in his own house with his life partner and their 3 children, ages 14, 10, and 3 months. Nelson has been selling scrap metal for 6 years and that's how he manages to provide for his family. With the desire to improve his living conditions, he has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to repair the roof of his home because it is in poor condition and when it rains, water leaks through. With the loan, he will buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails to repair the roof of his home.

loans.name: Destiny Group

texts.en:
Rukia is a mother of five school-aged children and is not married. For four years now, she has been managing a poultry business, raising broilers to sell. She is at her business from 5 a.m. to 10 p.m. per working day and is able to make a fair profit each month.  

This will be her fourth loan withTujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans, all of which were paid back successfully, to buy chicks and chicken feed and to keep managing her business needs. She used her profits to cover school fees and home food expenses and saved part of them. She dreams of buying a truck for her business. 

Rukia will share this loan with her loan group, Destiny, which totals five members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. She will use her portion of the loan to buy chicks and chicken feed to improve production.

loans.use: to buy chicks and chicken feed to improve production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock for her dairy business

loans.name: Temboni Group

texts.en:
Anna, who in her late 40s, is married with three children who are still in school.  She has been selling bites and soft drinks for seven years now.  She works from 6 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Anna's 12th loan with Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to start selling bites and to increase her soft drink stock. She has paid back all her loans successfully.  She is doing great and appreciates Kiva for its support to her group.  

Anna has used her profits to start building her house, pay school fees and cover household expenses. She will use this loan to buy sugar, flour, eggs and oil for making bites and also to purchase soft drinks to sell. She dreams of finishing the house she has started.

Anna will share this loan with her loan group, Temboni, which has five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, eggs and oil for making bites and also to purchase soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Penninah

texts.en: Peninah is a repeat customer. She is a resident of Ntungamo subcounty. Her major activity is farming, especially a banana plantation where she is getting little output and wants to add fertilizers in the form of grass and cow dung. This will increase income for her family. She applied for a loan of 2,000,000. She will use the money to improve her plantation; she has a challenge of low production in her farming due to limited capital to improve it. Her prime target is to yield high output from her plantations, also to send her children to better universities in the country. But she is limited by capital and funds to achieve her dreams. With this loan she believes her production will improve and her life style will change in the society.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers (cow dung and grass)

loans.name: Maa Bhandar Gharen Shg Group

texts.en:
The "Maa Bhandar Gharen SHG" group consists of eight women from a small village of Odisha, India. All the members of this group are engaged in different activities like animal rearing, vegetable selling, milk selling, etc. They help and support each other in their business activities, as well as in their personal lives. All the group members are dedicated and committed to enhance their businesses and make a handsome amount of money so that they will be able to educate their children and have a better standard of life. 

One of the group members is Shrabani, the lady standing first from the right. She is 40 years old, a married lady, and lives with her parents-in-law, husband and her two children, aged sixteen and eleven years. Both her children go to a local school. 

She has been engaged in cow rearing and cows’ milk selling for the last ten years. From this activity, she is able to contribute a small share to her family's household expenditures. She wants to register her first child in a good school. She, along with all the group members, has requested a loan to invest in their respective businesses for enhancing their business activity. 

Shrabani will use her portion to purchase a Jersey cow and renovate its shade. She is very excited to take this loan, and she says, "We are grateful to Kiva and its lenders for providing us this opportunity."

loans.use: to purchase a Jersey cow and renovate its shade.

loans.name: Vennie

texts.en:
Vennie, 43, is widowed with two children. She lives in Kasese, Uganda. 
 
She has been a farmer since 1999. She also operates a drug shop as a source of additional income. 

Vennie is a hardworking woman who looks forward to educating her children. She is faced with the challenge of inadequate capital, however, which is why she is requesting a loan to buy drugs for human consumption to sell in her drug shop and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy drugs for human consumption to sell in her drug store

loans.name: Parbati Shg Group

texts.en:
Indira is a 52-year-old lady who lives with her husband and two children in a small village in Odisha, India. In the picture, the lady standing second from the left is Indira. She is engaged in paddy cultivation. Her husband is doing the same business. 

Some years ago, Indira joined a group with ten other women from her village with the group name of "Parbati Self Help Group". All the group members are engaged in different business activities such as selling milk, vegetable cultivation, etc. to alleviate their poverty. Indira is an active member of this group. She motivated all the group members to form this group so they could help and support each other in their businesses and personal lives. 

Indira, along with her group, requested a loan of 143,000 INR. She will use her portion to purchase standard-quality seeds and fertilizers for her paddy cultivation. 

She hopes to build a house for her family, and she is very grateful to Kiva for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for her paddy cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blankets, clothing and footwear to sell

loans.name: Maa Mauli Mahila Mandal Shg Group

texts.en:
The responsible “Maa Mauli Mahila Mandal” self-help group is made up of ten members. The members of this group are all women from the district of Kalahandi in Odisha, India. All of the group members are engaged in different activities. One of them is Dusila, who was selected as their president. 

Dusila is a 40-year-old living with her husband and three children. She is engaged in the activity of making leaf plates and bowls woven out of dry leaves. She sells them in the nearby market. These plates are used for different purposes, mainly for serving food. She makes different types and sizes of plates, depending upon the demand of her customers. 

She has requested a loan for purchasing machinery by which she can weave the plates more frequently and quickly; also, raw materials like leaves, thread, glue and plastic. She has a very good relationship with her customers because she completes their orders on time. 

Dusila has a dream to make her children educated, and she is saying, "I am very thankful to Kiva for helping and supporting my group."

loans.use: to purchase a machine by which she can weave the plates more frequently and quickly; also, raw materials like leaves, thread, glue and plastic for her plate business.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
Ines es una mujer emprendedora tiene 62 años de edad, es casada y vive en Ica junto a su familia.
Tiene un hijo quien es su mayor orgullo y por quien luchó constantemente para mejorar su calidad de vida. Ahora él ya es grande, apoya a Ines en todo lo que esté a su alcance.
Desde hace más de 15 años se dedica a la actividad agrícola y le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, trabajadora, honesta y amable.
Ines está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar insumos como fertilizantes, plaguicidas así como también la mano de obra para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos y de esta manera ella pueda obtener productos de mejor calidad y así obtener mayores ingresos con las ventas.
texts.en:
Ines is an entrepreneurial woman who is 62 years old, married and lives in Ica with her family. She has one son who is her greatest pride and for whom she struggles constantly to improve his quality of life. Now he is grown up, and supports Ines as much as he can. For 15 years she has worked in agriculture and it has gone well for her because she is very responsible, hardworking, honest and kind.

Ines is grateful to Kiva lenders because with the help they have offered she will be able to buy supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides as well as pay for labor to maintain her crops, and in this way she will be able to produce higher-quality products and thus earn more income through her sales.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and to pay for the maintenance of her crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy source pans, plates and food to use in her hotel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials to use in her craft business

loans.name: Vjollca

texts.en: This is Vjollca, whose name in English means ‘Lilac’, and her husband Hajrullah, who have been photographed in front of their family home. The couple is living in the city of Lezha, where the tomb of the National Hero ‘Skanderbeg’ is located. They are applying for this loan to do some basic renovations to their home; install some doors and windows and also pave tiles. Vjollca suffers from an inherited disease, yet she sells in the streets of her city barbequed corn cobs from July to October and she makes a little living out of it. Almost everywhere in the street of every city you see individuals like Vjollca barbequing and selling chestnuts, seeds, corns cobs and popped corn, wheat, etc. Her husband recycles metal for cash. They are indeed very poor.

loans.use: to make some basic renovations to their family home

loans.name: Víctor Augusto

texts.es:
Víctor vive en el departamento de Cochabamba – Bolivia, es el hijo mayor de dos hermanos, su mamá es profesora y su papá tiene un pequeño taller de chapería. 
Víctor es técnico superior en mecánica industrial y actualmente trabaja como tornero, él se considera una persona estudiosa, trabajadora y perseverante por lo que quiere seguir estudiando y superarse profesionalmente. 
Víctor nos comenta que hasta ahora no pudo ingresar a la universidad debido a las dificultades económicas que tiene su familia, es por eso que solicita un crédito educativo, para poder estudiar la carrera de ingeniería electromecánica la cual le ayudará a complementar sus actuales conocimientos. 
Su sueño es conseguir un mejor cargo en la empresa que trabaja, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su situación económica y  ayudar en su hogar, haciéndose cargo de sus papas y de su hermana.
Víctor agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos ayudan a los jóvenes y generan nuevas oportunidades para sus estudios.
texts.en:
Victor is the oldest of two children and lives in Cochabamba Department in Bolivia. His mother is a teacher and his father has a small auto body repair shop. 
  
Victor is an industrial machinery technician and currently works as a lathe operator. He considers himself a studious, hardworking, and tenacious person, and therefore wants to continue his studies and advance his career.  

Victor noted that his family's financial problems have prevented him from enrolling in a university. He is therefore applying for a student loan so that he'll be able to pursue an Electromechanical Engineering program that will add to his current knowledge and experience. Victor's ambition is to move into a better job at the company where he now works. A better job would improve his situation and allow him to contribute financially to his family's household. With such a job, Victor could support his parents and sister.  

Victor is grateful to those use their financial resources to help young people like him take advantage of educational opportunities.

loans.use: to pay for his Electromechanical Engineering program.

loans.name: Marisol Del Socorro

texts.es: La actividad comercial a la que se dedica Marisol es la venta de productos químicos para la limpieza del hogar, ella es madre de dos hijos que asisten a la escuela primaria, lucha a diario para sacarlos adelante y que no les falte lo primordial que es la alimentación y educación, Marisol tiene como planes futuro incrementar sus productos para ir avanzando solicita el crédito para abastecer su negocio invirtiendo en pinezol, cloro, gas detergente y ambientadores liquido.
texts.en:
Marisol is the mother of two children who are in elementary school. She strives each day to improve their lives and to meet their two most basic needs, for food and for education. 

Marisol runs a business selling household cleaning products. She plans to offer a greater variety of products to boost her sales. She is applying for a loan to stock her business with goods such as Pine Sol, bleach, spray detergents, and liquid air fresheners.

loans.use: to purchase PineSol, bleach, spray detergents, and liquid air fresheners.

loans.name: Yamith Enrique

texts.es: Yamith es un hombre que sueña en grande, que busca siempre cualquier motivo para crecer y creer que puede lograr grandes metas, desde muy joven fue criado en el campo y decidió convertirse en emprendedor montado su propio negocio de cría de pollos, buscando mejorar las condiciones y forma de vida de su familia conformada por su pareja y sus tres hijos, como meta ha querido tener una gran empresa poder brindar empleo a frente necesitada que en verdad lo necesita pero sabe que para lograr esa meta hay que avanzar paso a paso por ello quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de pollos y cuido alimentándolos y engordándolos para sacar buen provecho por sus ventas
texts.en:
Yamith is a man who dreams big, and always looks for a reason to grow and believe that he can achieve ambitious goals. From a very young age he was raised in the country. He decided to become an entrepreneur by starting his own business raising chickens, in search of a better lifestyle for his family which is comprised of his wife and their three children. 

As a goal he has wanted to have a large business to provide employment to those who really need it. But he knows that to achieve this goal he has to advance step by step. For this reason he wants to request a loan to buy chickens, which he will care for by feeding them and fattening them to make a profit by selling them later on.

loans.use: to buy chickens which he will care for and fatten and make a profit by selling them

loans.name: Manuel Salvador

texts.es:
Manuel un hombre de 29 años de edad que debido al fallecimiento de su padre le toco hacerse cargo  de la finca familiar la cual se dedica al cultivo de café y la plantaciones de frutas y verduras, Manuel es padre de un hijo por el cual ha luchado y lo motiva cada día a mejorar, en vista de algunos problemas económicos solicita un crédito para la preparar la tierra comprando insumos como fertilizantes, abonos y riegos que el permita cuidar sus campos y realizar el mantenimiento respectivo a estos. 
Manuel al vivir con su madre se ha soñado toda la vida con construir un hogar y tener una finca comprara con sus propios recursos aunque este crédito será de gran ayuda para mantener la belleza y la potencia de sus hermosos cultivos
texts.en:
Manuel is a 29 year old man who due to this father's death has taken charge of the family coffee farm and areas planted with fruits and vegetables.  Manuel is the father of a son for whom he has struggled, his reason to do better every day.  Because of some financial problems, he is seeking a loan to prepare the ground for planting, buying products such as fertilizers, manure, and irrigation parts that will allow him to care for and maintain his fields.

All his life, Manuel, who lives with his mother, has dreamed of building a home and having a farm.  He will buy what he can from his own resources but this loan will be a great help in maintaining the beauty and quality of his crops.

loans.use: to buy  products such as irrigation parts, manure and fertilizers to maintain the beauty and health of his plants

loans.name: Yona

texts.en:
Yona, 50, is married with six children, all of whom attend school. He lives in Kasese, Uganda. 

He is a food vender who deals in fresh foods, a business he began as a source of income. He dreams of expanding his business, however much he is faced with the challenges of limited capital and perishible products. 

Yona is hardworking and intends to use this loan to buy bananas, avocados and other fresh foods to sell.

loans.use: To buy bananas, avocados and other fresh foods to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise needed for her business

loans.name: Nageswari Mahila Mandal Shg Group

texts.en:
Debaki is a 46-year-old lady who lives with her husband and one child in a small village of Odisha, India. Her child is in school. She is engaged in mushroom cultivation. Debaki, along with nine women from her village, made a self-help group having the name "Nageswari Mahila Mandal SHG" to educate each other in their business activities. All the group members are engaged in different activities, such as paddy cultivation, vegetable cultivation, flower selling, etc. All the group members help and support each other in their personal lives as well as in their business activities. 

Debaki has been doing mushroom cultivation for seven years. She produces mushrooms and then sells them. Her husband is a farmer, and he does paddy and vegetable cultivation. Debaki's husband helps her in her activity, and he also helps her to sell mushrooms in the market. 

She and her group members have requested a loan amount of 120,000 INR for their business activities. Debaki will use her portion to purchase standard-quality seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for her mushroom cultivation. 

All the group members are very happy and excited to take this opportunity, and also they are very thankful to Kiva for this.

loans.use: to purchase standard-quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for her mushroom cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchases more zinc, cement, paint and mat for resale.

loans.name: Amadan

texts.en:
Amadan, 37, is married with four children. He lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. 

When he realized the high demand for maize flour, he decided to deal in the business. With his monthly income, he is able to maintain his family's cost of living, especially the payment of school fees for his children.  He needs this loan to buy bags of maize flour and onions to sell.

Amadan hopes to expand his business into a big wholesale shop and educate his children to high levels of education.

loans.use: to buy bags of maize flour and onions to sell

loans.name: Maria Eusebia

texts.es: María tiene 49 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto  a su nieto de 15 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos de desde hace dos años y además  confecciona ropa desde hace 6 años y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. María solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea reparar el techo de su vivienda y además desea construir el corredor para lo cual necesita materiales como: lámina galvanizada, madera, hierro, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
María is 49 years old and lives in her own home with her 15-year-old grandson. María runs two separate businesses; she has raised and sold chickens for two years and made clothing for six years. These two endeavors have allowed María to earn a living and maintain her home. 

María is applying for a loan from FUSAI because she would like to repair the roof on her home and also construcdt a hallway. She therefore needs materials such as galvanized sheeting, wood, iron, and other supplies. She hopes to obtain this loan and begin the repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheeting, wood, iron, and other supplies to repair the roof on her home.

loans.name: Joaquin Emilio

texts.es:
El señor Joaquín trabajo hace algunos años en una empresa de cementos, allí tuvo la oportunidad de estudias construcción en una institución muy reconocida y fue así como decidió independizarse y dedicarse en pleno al arte de la construcción renunciando a su trabajo en la empresa.
Hoy en día es un hombre trabajador y muy prospero, realiza trabajos muy variados y sus clientes lo recomiendan muy bien.
Posee conocimientos en distintas áreas, lo que lo hace un hombre multifacético.
Solicita una ayuda económica para la compra de una sierra circular, herramienta que le permitirá trabajar mucho más eficientemente ya que podrá cortar los materiales difíciles en poco tiempo.
texts.en:
Several years ago, Joaquin worked in a cement company. There he had the opportunity to study construction in a very well recognized institution, and he decided to start working independently and dedicate himself completely to the art of construction, quitting his job at the company.

Today he is a very hardworking and prosperous man. He does a wide variety of projects for his clients and they recommend him greatly. He possesses knowledge of distinct areas, which makes him a multifaceted man.

He requests some economic assistance to buy a circular saw, a tool that will allow him to work more efficiently because he will be able to cut difficult materials in less time.

loans.use: to buy a circular saw

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Shaktiswarup Shg Group

texts.en:
The women of the Shaktiswarup Self-help Group are from a small village in Odisha in the northern part of India. The group is composed of thirteen women who earn their living by raising animals such as cattle and chickens, selling milk, and cultivating and selling vegetables. They need additional capital to maintain, enhance or expand their businesses and decided to apply for a loan with People's Forum. They are excited and full of hope to begin this new harvesting season with solid goals and dreams. 

Hiramani is a 45-year-old married mother of one child, aged 19 years. In the picture, the lady seated in the middle and wearing a red-white colour saree is Hiramani. She completed three years of formal education, but due to the poor economic condition of her family, had to leave her education behind. Along with all the clients of People's Forum, Hiramani realizes that education is a vital key to a successful future for her child. She shares that her business is running quite well and, because of its success, she will be able to register her child in a good school this year! Her husband shares the same goals for the child. 

Hiramani is engaged in vegetable cultivation, and she produces potatoes, tomatoes, onions, and seasonal vegetables. She is applying for her first loan with People's Forum. The requested funds will be used to purchase standard-quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for her vegetable cultivation. 

With an optimistic spirit and positive attitude, Hiramani looks forward to this new year with its challenges, blessings and successes. On behalf of her colleagues, Hiramani expresses gratitude and appreciation for the support from Kiva investors throughout the world who lend such necessary and vital support. In addition, the ladies send greetings to all for a happy, healthy and successful new year!

loans.use: to purchase standard-quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for her vegetable cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chickens and pigs to later sell at a better price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice, and cooking season to expand her business.

loans.name: Maria Edith

texts.es:
La señora Maria hace poco inicio el negocio de venta de productos de la marca Herbalife, oficio que inicio por la motivación que le dio una hermana.
Ella trabaja todos los días, y a pesar de su edad nunca se ha quejado de su trabajo y por el contrario siente que lo disfruta mucho.
Sus clientes más cotidianos son amigos, vecinos y familiares, clientes que referencian muy bien a la señora Maria.
Ella pide un aliento económico para abastecerse de productos de esta marca y comenzar a vender a mayor escala pues se siente en capacidad de vender más pero su falta de capital se lo ha impedido.
Sus hijos se sienten orgullosos al verla y dicen que es una mujer muy tenaz de sueños inquebrantables.
texts.en:
Not long ago, Maria started a business selling Herbalife products, an idea that she got from her sister. She works every day, and in spite of her age she has never complained about her work and on the contrary she enjoys it very much. Her everyday customers are her friends, neighbors and relatives, customers who give very good references about Maria. 

She requests an economic assistance to restock her products from this brand and begin to sell at a greater scale, since she believes she can sell more but her lack of capital has impeded her. Her children feel very proud of her and say that she is a very tenacious woman with unbreakable dreams.

loans.use: to buy Herbalife products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks and biscuits to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice, and cooking season to expand her business.

loans.name: Marleny Del Socorro

texts.es:
Con el ánimo de crecer la señora Marleny se levantó todos los días a alimentar sus ganados y es que su sueño de ver sus predios convertidos en grandes establecimientos para las crías de animales los ve cada vez más cerca y sabe que hay entidades que la pueden acercar a este sueño es por esta razón que recurre a una para solicitar un crédito que le permita ampliar y modificar sus cocheras comprar cerdas de cría y un ternero para engordar, pues hace 10 años ha venido realizando esta actividad la cual ha sido muy lucrativa para ella y le ha permitido salir a delante junto con su esposo y su hijo que estudia veterinaria para complementar el negocio familiar. 
Marleny está muy motivada con el crédito pues podrá ver sus predios más amplios y en mejor estado para que sus animales se sienta más cómodos y ella reboce de alegría al levantarse y ver hecho realidad ese sueño que ha forjado durante 10 años
texts.en:
With hopes of growing her business, Marleny gets up daily to feed her cattle.  Her dream is to see her farms become big places for raising animals.  Every day this dream seems more near and she knows there are sources of help to approach this dream.  For that reason she has resorted to seeking a loan that will let her enlarge and renovate her enclosures,  and to buy breeding sows and a calf to fatten.  For ten years she has been working at this, and has been able to earn money and get ahead along with her husband  and her son, who is studying to be a veterinarian to complement the family business.  

Marleny is highly motivated since with the loan she will be able to see her areas enlarged and in better shape so that her animals will feel more comfortable.  She is joyful daily when waking wakes to see the dream becoming reality,  which she has worked on for ten years.

loans.use: to repair and enlarge her enclosures, and to buy breeding sows and a calf to fatten

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more used shoes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cosmetic for resale.

loans.name: Maria Alba

texts.es: María tiene 48 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y dos hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad. María es una mujer muy trabajadora y dedicada a su familia. María trabaja en una institución cercana a su localidad y es así como apoya a su familia con la economía. María solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir un cuarto para lo cual necesita materiales como: cemento, ladrillo, hierro, arena, una ventana y una puerta.
texts.en: Maria is 48 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and two adult children. Maria is very hard-working and dedicated to her family. She works in an institution near her town in order to contribute to the family’s economy. Maria is applying for this loan at FUSAI because she wants to build a room. She needs construction materials, such as cement, bricks, iron, sand, a window and a door.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, iron, sand, a window and a door to build a room.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil; rice, and cooking season to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal to expand her business.

loans.name: Maa Bimala Shg Group

texts.en: The Maa Bimala Self Help Group consists of 10 members from a small village in the Kalahandi district, Odisha, India. All the members of this group are female. They are engaged in different business activities for the elimination of poverty. Three of the women have very low incomes, but this helps them to want to struggle harder to get ahead. One person who deserves to be highlighted is Subhashree (in the picture the lady seated in the middle in a green sari), who works selling vegetables. Through her job, she works to support her family, to improve her business and continue growing. She is a very determined person who wants to continue growing. She is seeking part of this loan in order to be able to invest it in the purchase of vegetables like tomatoes, onions, green peppers, potatoes and other vegetables so that she can continue with her sales. The group is very grateful for this opportunity for growth that it is receiving.

loans.use: To purchase tomatoes, onions, green peppers, potatoes and other vegetables

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José tiene 68 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 14 años, 16 años y 21 años de edad. José se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad y además se dedica a la agricultura. El es un hombre muy trabajador y comprometido con su familia. José ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y grava.
texts.en: Jose is 68 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and three children, aged 14, 16 and 21. Jose works as a security guard and as a farmer. He is a very hard-working man and he is very dedicated to his family. Jose has decided to apply for a loan at FUSAI to invest in building a wall, for which he needs construction materials, such as bricks, cement, sand, iron and gravel.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron and gravel to build a wall.

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita is 44 years old and married. She has two children and works very hard to provide for them.

Anecita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 22,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Anecita has been in this business for eleven years and sells a variety of items such as soap, sardines, noodles, and other groceries. 

In the future, Anecita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 25,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Vilma has been in this business for 5 years. Vilma earns more income from motorcycle transport.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of buying spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net.

loans.name: Gulnaz

texts.ru: Гульназ 34 года, замужем, мать 4 детей. Гульназ  на протяжении 5 лет в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается торговлей одеждой на местном рынке. Стартовав с суммы 40,000 сом, на сегодняшний день Гульназ получает ежемесячную прибыль в размере 18,000 сомов (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) для увеличение товарооборота, а именно покупку одежды. Гульназ участник группы "Асылзат", всего в группе состоят 4 человека. Доходы от кредита Гульназ планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, а также хочет осуществить свою мечту и приобрести автомобиль.
texts.en: Gulnaz is 34 years old, married, and the mother of 4 children.  For the past 5 years, Gulnaz's work selling clothes at the local market has served as her family's primary source of income.  She started with 40,000 KGS, but now receives a monthly income of 18,000 KGS.  WIth the goal of further developing her business, she turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 60,000 KGS to increase product turnover, and in particular to purchase clothing.  Gulnaz is a member of the group "Asilzat," which is comprised of 4 people.  With the income from the loan, Gulnaz plans to invest in the further growth of her business, and also hopes to accomplish her dream of buying a car.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to increase business

loans.name: Deisy Johana

texts.es:
Deisy, en compañía de su esposo se han dedicado a la cría y producción de animales desde que están juntos, ellos adiestran caballos y luego los venden en las ferias municipales a muy buenos precios.
Ella desea dedicarse a un negocio alternativo que le genere ingresos extra a ella y a su esposo, por eso quiere iniciar con un negocio de cría de pollos de engorde, pollos que posteriormente venderían en las fincas cercanas.
Esta es una actividad muy popular entre los habitantes del municipio de caldas y cada vez mas está tomando fuerza.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran empresa de producción pecuaria y animal que le dé la oportunidad de abrirse un espacio en el mercado nacional.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de 100 pollos y 14 kilos de cuido para su engorde.
texts.en:
Deisy, along with her ​​husband, have been devoted to the breeding and raising animals ever since they became a couple. They train their horses and then sell in local shows at great prices.

She wants to pursue an alternative business that will generate extra income for her and her husband.  She wants to start a business breeding broiler chickens and subsequently sell in nearby areas.

This is a very popular activity among the inhabitants of the town of Caldas and increasingly is taking hold.  Her dream is to have a large animal livestock production buiness and give her the opportunity to open a stall in the domestic market place.

She is requesting a loan to buy 100 chickens and 14 kilos of feed for fattening.

loans.use: to purchase and raise chickens.

loans.name: Katleho

texts.en:
Katleho is applying for a second loan to support his studies until he graduates December 2014 from the Maharishi Institute. He has provided the following update on his progress since receiving the first loan:

“My studies have progressed very well, simply because since my first loan, I am no longer worried about my fees and transport costs. I am able to focus on my studies.”

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
En busca de tener un hogar propia para su pareja y sus 4 hijos la señora Sandra decidió comenzar con una actividad hace 4 años que radica principalmente en la comercialización de ropa y calzado para hombre y dama. 
Es una mujer muy activa e independiente que sabe cómo realizar su trabajo y cubrir sus falencias y son estas falencias las que le han variado sus ventas pues necesita un reforma de producción para seguir a la par con la competencia por ende quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de mercancía en calzado y ropa con la cual pueda darle a sus clientes lo que piden como líneas nuevas y productos novedosos, pues sabe que gran parte de los ingresos de su hogar depende de su negocio.
texts.en:
In search of having her own home for her partner and their four children, señora Sandra decided to start a business four years ago that mainly consists of the sale of clothing and footwear for men and women. 

She is a very active and independent woman who knows how to carry out her work and cover her shortcomings. These shortcomings are what have varied her sales, so she needs a change of production in order to continue at par with the competition. Therefore, she wants to request a loan for the purchase of merchandise in footwear and clothing with which she can give her customers what they ask for like new lines and new products, since a large part of the income of her home depends on her business.

loans.use: to buy footwear and clothing to improve her supply for her customers.

loans.name: Thokozani

texts.en:
Thokozani is applying for a second loan to support his studies through graduation in December 2014 at the Maharishi Institute. He has provided the following update on his progress since receiving the first loan:

“As far as my studies are concerned, everything is going very well. Before I got the loan, I used to worry a lot about transport money, but now with the loan I can concentrate on my studies.”

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Enriquita

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Enriquita works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a general store. Enriquita is borrowing 21,000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Enriquita has been sustaining her business activities through her past twenty loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Marijo

texts.en:
Marijo is 43 years old and married. She has six children who are in school. Marijo works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, and chips.

Marijo has been in this business for 5 years.

In the future, Marijo would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, and chips.

loans.name: Salima

texts.ru: Салиме 46 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Салимы среднее образование, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи с 1989 года занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду и целеустремленности Салимы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 коровы, 2 теленка, 2 лошади и 15 овец, для содержания скота есть все условия. Также Салима занимается полеводством. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Салима обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку минеральных удобрений и семян. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и хочет накопить средства на свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Salima is 46 years old, married, and the mother of 3 children.  She has a secondary education.  Beginning in 1989, Salima's work in animal husbandry and agriculture has served as an additional source of income for her and her family.  Thanks to Salima's hard work and diligence, Salima now has 2 cows, 2 calves, 2 horses, and 15 sheep, as well as all of the necessities required for raising cattle.  Salima also works in agriculture.  Her monthly income is 15,000 KGS.  With the goal for further expanding her business, Salima turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 80,000 KGS to purchase fertilizer and seeds.  With the income from the loan she plans to increase the number of cattle in her care, and also save money towards her son's wedding.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is a 68-year-old married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Julieta has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a 17,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items such as soap, snack foods, and other groceries.

Julieta has been in this business for six years. In the future, Julieta would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items such as soap, snack foods, and other groceries.

loans.name: Thabang

texts.en:
Thabang is applying for a second loan to support his studies through to graduation in December 2014 at the Maharishi Institute. He has provided the following update on his progress since receiving the first loan:

“My studies have been good since receiving the first loan from Kiva. I have been able to attend my lectures without any worries about how I would get home (transport money). I have been working hard and making sure that I pass all my courses, to ensure that I can graduate and get a good job, to be able to pay Kiva back, so that you can help other people like me. Thanks Kiva!”

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Isaias

texts.es: Isaias tiene 35 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Santo Tomás La Unión, departamento de Suchitepéquez, tiene 2 hijos, primero tiene 13 años de edad estudia primero básico, el segundo tiene 5 años de edad está estudiando párvulos, Isaias hace fletes en su pick-up de la comunidad donde vive hacia el municipio desde hace 5 años, también tiene local donde vende tortillas la esposa es quién se encarga de atender, Isaias necesita un crédito por un monto de Q. 3,000.00 para comprar llantas para su pick-up, La meta de Isaias es ayudar a sus hijos para estudiante y se gradúen como profesionales.
texts.en:
Isaias is 35 years old. He lives in a town called Santo Tomas La Union, in the department of Suchitepequez. He has two children. The oldest is 13 years old and is in 7th grade; the youngest is 5 years old and is in kindergarten. Isaias uses his pick-up truck to haul cargo from his community to the town. He has been doing this for 5 years. He also has a shop where he sells tortillas. Her wife is in charge of the shop.

Isaias needs a loan for Q. 3,000.00 to buy wheels for his pick-up. His goal is to help his children study so that they can graduate and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy wheels.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a compressor and a dual needle sewing machine to double her production

loans.name: Gulsunay

texts.ru: Гулсунай 39 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. Гулсунай занимается торговлей одеждой на местном рынке уже на протяжении 3 лет. Стартовав с суммы 30,000 сом, на сегодняшний день Гулсунай имеет товар в обороте на сумму 200,000 сомов (KGS) и ежемесячную прибыль в размере 18,000 сомов (KGS). Гулсунай является участником группы "Асылзат", всего в группе 4 человека. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулсунай обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) для увеличение товарооборота, а именно покупку одежды.  Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего торгового бизнеса, а также хочет купить дом.
texts.en: Gulsunay is 39 years old, married, and the mother of 4 children.  Gulsunay has been selling clothes at the local market for 3 years.  She began with a sum of 30,000 KGS, but has now sold 200,000 KGS worth of goods.  Her monthly income is 18,000 KGS.  Gulsunay is a member of the group "Asilzat," which is comprised of 4 people.  With the goal of further expanding her business, Gulsunay turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 70,000 KGS to increase product turnover, and in particular to purchase clothing.  With the income from the loan, she plans to further invest in the growth of her retail business, and also hopes to buy a house.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Kifiloe

texts.en:
Kifiloe is applying for a second loan to support her studies through graduation in December 2014 at the Maharishi Institute. She has provided the following update on her progress since receiving the first loan:

“Since I received my Kiva loan, my life has been much easier as I don’t have to worry about my fees, and the stipend helps me to pay for my transport. I am no longer absent because of transport to school. My studies are progressing well.”

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to sell cosmetics.

loans.name: Elvin Manuel

texts.es:
Elvin es un hombre emprendedor, tiene 32 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Santa junto a su familia.
Desde hace casi 1 año se dedica a la venta de frutas y limones en un puesto que tiene en el mercado. Le va muy bien porque es una persona muy responsable, trabajador, innovador y respetuosos y amable con los clientes.
Elvin está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar mercadería para poder surtir el negocio y así pueda obtener mayores ganancias y con el tiempo cumplir su gran sueño: Terminar de construir su casa".
texts.en:
Elvin is an enterprising man, 32 years old, single and lives in the town of Santa with his family.  For almost one year, he has been dedicated to selling fruit and lemons in a stall in the local market.

He is doing very well because he is a very responsible, hardworking, innovative, respectful and a friendly person with customers.

Elvin is grateful to Kiva lenders for the support they have given him.  He can purchase merchandise to stock his business and thus make higher profits and eventually fulfill his dream: Finish to build his house. "

loans.use: to purchase produce for his fruit selling business.

loans.name: Gulnoza

texts.ru: Гулноза молодая и энергичная женщина. Ей 24 года. Она разведена и на воспитании имеет 1 несовершеннолетнего ребенка. Гулноза одна воспитывает  и обеспечивает своего ребенка. Для того, чтобы прокормить себя и своего ребенка она начала свой бизнес купле продажей женской одежды. Уже в течение одного года она введет свой бизнес. Вначале она продавала свой товар своим соседям и ходила по их домам. Теперь она имеет точку торговли на местном рынке. Гулноза хочет купить женскую одежду для нового сезона и с такой целью она запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulnoza is a young, energetic woman of 24.  She is divorced and has 1 child, who is still a minor.  Gulnoza is raising and providing for her child by herself.  In order to feed herself and her baby, she started her own business buying and selling women's clothing.  She has been running her business now for one year.  In the beginning she sold her wares door-to-door to her neighbors, but now has her own retail stand at the local market.  Gulnoza hopes to purchase women's clothing for the new season, and for this reason is requesting a loan of 4,000 TJS.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy women’s clothing for the new season

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en:
Maryam is a 54-year-old married mother of seven who works as a receptionist to support her husband with the increasing family needs. Her fourteen years of experience have given her patience and wisdom in life. She considers her income combined with her husband's to be very low compared to the increasing living needs. 

She is an ambitious woman who puts much effort into developing her living. She acquired a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua to settle requested medical fees for a requested eye surgery. She dreams of attaining better financial sustainability for her family's livelihood.

loans.use: To pay for a a requested surgery she has to undergo
